data.title: Create asset
data.description: An asset represents an application or product being supported. Create an asset to get started with the process of onboarding your product into Mockback.

data.title: Set Mockback Url in your product
data.description: To provide seemless experience to your users, add a link from your product to Mockback. By triggering a button for example from your product, your users will be securely transferred to Mockback with their details.

data.title: Securely transmit user information to Mockback
data.description: When you redirect from your product, transmit the user information like email and name securely using JWT tokens. Password for JWT is set by you during the asset creation process.
